p: All animal experimental procedures were conducted in accordance with the guidelines and approval of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) of Hebei University (IACUC-20180051). Prior to the experiment, rats were placed in a standardized laboratory environment under a 12 h light/12 h dark cycle at temperature of 20–26 °C and humidity of 40–70%. All animals had access to water and food.
